Adult Skills Funding

Fully Funded Training for Adults

Access fully funded training opportunities to enhance your skills and advance your career in South Yorkshire.

Requirements

  • Maximum salary of £24,000
  • No higher than a full level 3 qualification
  • Aged 19 or over
  • Living in Yorkshire

Benefits

  • Complete cost coverage
  • Flexible learning options
  • Industry-recognised qualifications
  • Career progression opportunities

Check Your Eligibility

Available Courses

Digital Marketing Essentials

Master the fundamentals of digital marketing, including social media, content creation, and analytics.

Fully Funded
Provider
Sheffield College
Level
Level 3
Location
Sheffield City Campus
Duration
12 weeks

Healthcare Support Worker

Develop essential skills for working in healthcare settings, including patient care and medical terminology.

Fully Funded
Provider

Level
Level 2
Location
Barnsley Main Campus
Duration

Sustainable Construction Practices

Co-Funded

Level
Level 3
Location

Our team is here to help you understand your funding options and find the right course for your career goals.
